description: Source code for FastAPI router managing project files, including CRUD operations, versioning, and export functionalities.

classes.name: ProjectFileBase
classes.description: Base model for project files containing path, content, and binary flag.

classes.name: ProjectFileCreate
classes.description: Payload model for creating or updating a project file.

classes.name: ProjectFileUpdate
classes.description: Partial update model for a project file.

classes.name: ProjectFileOut
classes.description: Response model representing a project file with id and details.

classes.name: VersionCreate
classes.description: Payload for creating a project version snapshot.

methods.name: List[ProjectFileOut] list_project_files( project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Fetches a list of all files in a specific project.

methods.name: ProjectFileOut create_or_update_file( payload: ProjectFileCreate, project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Creates a new file or updates an existing file by path.

methods.name: ProjectFileOut get_file( file_id: str = Path(..., description="File ID"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Retrieve details of a specific file by ID.

methods.name: ProjectFileOut update_file( payload: ProjectFileUpdate, file_id: str = Path(..., description="File ID"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Update attributes of a file identified by ID.

methods.name: None delete_file( file_id: str = Path(..., description="File ID"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Delete a specific file by ID.

methods.name: VersionOut create_version( payload: VersionCreate, project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Create a new snapshot version of the current project files.

methods.name: List[VersionOut] list_versions( project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: List all versions of a project.

methods.name: List[ProjectFileOut] restore_version( version_number: int = Path(..., description="Version number to restore"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Restore project files from a specific version snapshot.

methods.name: export_project_zip( project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), download: Optional[bool] = Query(default=True, description="Whether to prompt download via Content-Disposition"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Stream a ZIP archive of the project files for download.

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="New file content")$/

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content: str = Field(..., description="File contents as text")$/

ctags.name: create_or_update_file
ctags.signature: ( payload: ProjectFileCreate, project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: create_version
ctags.signature: ( payload: VersionCreate, project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: delete_file
ctags.signature: ( file_id: str = Path(..., description="File ID"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: description
ctags.pattern: /^    description: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Description for the snapshot")$/

ctags.name: export_project_zip
ctags.signature: ( project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), download: Optional[bool] = Query(default=True, description="Whether to prompt download via Content-Disposition"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: get_file
ctags.signature: ( file_id: str = Path(..., description="File ID"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: is_binary
ctags.pattern: /^    is_binary: Optional[bool] = Field(None, description="New binary flag")$/

ctags.name: is_binary
ctags.pattern: /^    is_binary: bool = Field(False, description="Whether the file content is binary")$/

ctags.name: list_project_files
ctags.signature: ( project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: list_versions
ctags.signature: ( project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: path
ctags.pattern: /^    path: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="New file path")$/

ctags.name: path
ctags.pattern: /^    path: str = Field(..., description="File path within the project (e.g., src\/app\/page.tsx)"/

ctags.name: restore_version
ctags.signature: ( version_number: int = Path(..., description="Version number to restore"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: update_file
ctags.signature: ( payload: ProjectFileUpdate, file_id: str = Path(..., description="File ID"), project_id: str = Path(..., description="Project ID"), current_user: UserPublic = Depends(get_current_user), )
